title: SOL 500pk All Purpose Cloths, 38x23cm Disposable Cleaning J Cloths Blue, Soft, Absorbent, Gentle & Reusable for Household and Professional Cleaning, Ideal for Polishing, Dusting, Washing Dishes
features: Bulk Pack - Our blue cloths can be used for various household and cleaning tasks including dusting, polishing, cleaning & washing dishes. Great for disinfecting counter tops, knobs, handles, & even wiping down groceries when they arrive.

Great For Delicate Surfaces - These cloths to clean surfaces has excellent absorbency & if wrung out, leaves surfaces barely damp. With our jay cloths, you don't need much cleaning products to get things clean. It's soft & delicate leaving no marks.

Brilliant For Dusting And Kitchen Spills - Our j cloths style are very helpful at mopping up spills. All purpose cloths are great to replace paper towels for cleaning up messy spills when you don't want to ruin or stain your good kitchen towels.

Streak-Free & Lint-Free on Glass/Shiny Surfaces - These cleaning cloths are good at cleaning smudges off your glasses and for cleaning around the home/car. Dusting and polishing your car can also be done. It holds up well and is ready for more work.

Throw Into The Washer/Dispose Completely - Our disposable cloth comes in 100pk. Supermarket versions are not as thick or long-lasting as this. You can use & wash these cloths multiple times to remain hygienic or you can also throw these away after.
description: Product Description Previous page Next page 1 Great Value 2 Cleaning Essentials Home & Kitchen Cleaning Aid 500pk All Purpose Cloths Add To Basket 20pk Car Cleaning Cloths Add To Basket 4pk Yellow Dusters Buying Options 20pk Cleaning Cloth Add To Basket 2pk Buzz Glass Clot Add To Basket 20pk Dish Cloths Buying Options Customer Reviews 4.1 out of 5 stars 40 4.2 out of 5 stars 149 4.4 out of 5 stars 963 4.0 out of 5 stars 266 4.4 out of 5 stars 118 3.4 out of 5 stars 87 Price £29.99 £ 29 . 99 £9.99 £ 9 . 99 — £7.99 £ 7 . 99 £4.99 £ 4 . 99 — Absorbent ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Versatile ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Durable ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Efficient Cleaning ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Multipack ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ ✔ Can these cloths be used on all household surfaces? Yes, our blue cloths are versatile, perfect for dusting, polishing, and cleaning various surfaces, including countertops, handles, and more. Are they safe for delicate surfaces? Indeed, these cloths are soft and delicate, providing good absorbency without leaving marks, ideal for sensitive surfaces. How effective are these cloths for kitchen spills? Exceptionally effective! They're designed to mop up spills efficiently, serving as an alternative to paper towels in the kitchen. Do they leave streaks on glass or shiny surfaces? Not at all. Our cloths are streak-free and lint-free, making them perfect for cleaning glasses, shiny surfaces, and even your car. Can these cloths be washed and reused? Absolutely. While disposable, they're durable enough to be washed and reused multiple times, or you can choose to dispose of them after use. (Do Not Mix With Other Clothes or Textiles Whilst Washing)
